title: 求帮忙找mod
author: xiao_hua666
txt_content:
求一款里面有公交车或者拓展包里面有公交车的模组
版本为1.12.2！
不管是站内，站外都行

replies.author: 酥宁最酥啦
replies.txt_content:
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/cars-mod-xujmod

车辆mod  里面有各种车辆

replies.txt_content:
